channel.title: One of my biggest regrets ever
channel.description:
So i made a bid of 110$ on moparscape sponsored server list, however on the 7th or 8th i seen that you needed an application and i went to make sure i did all that. Then after i did it i couldnt see my bid anymore so i have no clue if i was in the top 10. I was also informed afterwards if i was able to bid i was already approved. So i must have done a application in the past.
I really want to pay to be on this sponsored list i dont know whether to wait it out or just pay to the same place i sent the 5$ to be able to bid. I seen the rule that if i dont pay within the first day after bid ends i will be banned from ever being sponsored again so i am kind of confused on what to do. I hope i get some feedback from someone that can help me soon. I thank each and everyone who reads this, hopefully you can get some help pointed my way.

item.title: One of my biggest regrets ever
item.dc:creator: @jcrane164 jcrane164
item.description:
@jcrane164 wrote:

Thanks tom. Im sure the 65k bid wont do it. This sucks, i would have bumped my bid up to get on top 10.

Read full topic
item.source: One of my biggest regrets ever

item.title: One of my biggest regrets ever
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

You’re currently #12 out of all the servers who bidded, I’ve approved your application but the bidding process ended 5 hours ago. So I’m afraid you won’t be able to get on the sponsored list this month, but you won’t be charged your bid either. The only way you’d be able to get on the list this month is if another server in the top 10 fails to pay up, in which case you’ll be bumped up. So 2 servers would need to fail the payment, which I don’t see happening if I’m honest.

Keep up to date with the process by reading all the appropriate sticky topics in the sponsored apps section, and try again next month.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/sponsbid.php

Read full topic
item.source: One of my biggest regrets ever

item.title: One of my biggest regrets ever
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:7, topic:507105”]Without a doubt, you’d be place.
Just don’t waste your money though man, the RSPS scene is not worth it. People are playing rs07 now.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: One of my biggest regrets ever
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Creating multiple topics won’t solve your problems any faster. Though MITB isn’t as active as he once was, he will eventually see your other threads via him actually viewing the forums or being refereed to them by a staff member.

Read full topic
